body_html: CuSparse libraries support multiple sparse matrix formats such as COO, CSR, ELLPACK etc where a different format might make sense depending on the sparse matrix property. Given that, would it be possible to allow the user to control the sparse matrix layout to begin with? Like say we extend .layout option beyond just sparse_coo to allow addition of other sparse matrix formats. Is that easy to extend? I dont know enough about how these tensors are implemented to know that myself.
